title: How to Verify a Solution
text: If a point is a solution to a system, then it satisfies both equations.
speech: If a point is a solution to a system, then it satisfies both equations.
pacedSpeech: If a point is a solution to a system, then it satisfies both equations.

title: Plugging in the Point
text: Let us plug in the point. $$1+\frac{3}{4}=2$$. The first equation is not satisfied, so the point is not a solution.
speech: Let us plug in the point. , 1 plus 3 fourths, is equal to 2 . The first equation is not satisfied, so the point is not a solution.

. The first equation is not satisfied, so the point is not a solution.
